stochastic_function: lambda usage_decision: {0.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else ({5.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' else {20.0: 1.0})

lambda usage_decision, carcinogenic_activity, human_exposure: {-1000: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-100: 1.0} if (usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high') or (usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium') else {-50: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-10: 1.0} if (usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium') or (usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low') else {-5: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-1: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-0.5: 1.0} if (usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium') or (usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' and human_exposure == 'high') else {-0.05: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else {0: 1.0}

lambda economic_value, cancer_cost: {0.0: 1.0} if (economic_value == 0.0 and cancer_cost == 0) or (economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -0.05) or (economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == -0.5) else {4.95: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -0.05 else {4.5: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -0.5 else {4.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -1.0 else {0.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -5.0 else {-5.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -10.0 else {-45.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -50.0 else {-95.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -100.0 else {-995.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -1000.0 else {20.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == 0 else {19.95: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == -0.05 else {19.5: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == -0.5 else {19.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == -1.0 else {15.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == -5.0 else {10.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == -10.0 else {-30.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == -50.0 else {-80.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == -100.0 else {-980.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 20.0 and cancer_cost == -1000.0 else {5.0: 1.0}
